name: The International Federation of Inspection Agencies
membership: IFIA has a formal memorandum of understanding with CEOC, a Brussels based association with a similar mandate.
goal: IFIA aims to improve the methods, standards, safety procedures and rules used by its members for the benefit of both them and their stakeholders. IFIA works closely with governments, ngos and other trade bodies in the realisation of its objectives.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Consumer Affairs, Customs, Energy, Food Safety, General and Institutional Affairs, Internal Market, Trade, Transport
euInitiatives: Consumer Product Safety, Toy Safety, Personal Protective Equipment, Ecolabelling, Medical Devices, TTIP, EU-China Relations, EU-India relations, Food
